fields.name: CreatedAt
fields.description: The time the WCF relay was created.

fields.name: IsDynamic
fields.description: Returns true if the relay is dynamic; otherwise, false.

fields.name: ListenerCount
fields.description: The number of listeners for this relay. Note that min :1 and max:25 are supported.

fields.name: RequiresClientAuthorization
fields.description: Returns true if client authorization is needed for this relay; otherwise, false.

fields.name: RequiresTransportSecurity
fields.description: Returns true if transport security is needed for this relay; otherwise, false.

fields.name: UpdatedAt
fields.description: The time the namespace was updated.

fields.name: UserMetadata
fields.description: The usermetadata is a placeholder to store user-defined string data for the WCF Relay endpoint. For example, it can be used to store descriptive data, such as list of teams and their contact information. Also, user-defined configuration settings can be stored.
